properties.body:
EASTERN IONIAN SEA.
GREECE.
HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS.
DNC 09.
1. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS SUNRISE TO SUNSET DAILY
   MONDAY THRU THURSDAY, SUNRISE TO 1200Z FRIDAYS
   UNTIL 31 DEC EXCEPT HOLIDAYS WITHIN
   FOUR MILES OF 36-42.33N 021-46.50E.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 51/15.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 01 JAN 16.
